post:
Hello LET people , 

as you may have noticed in the last two months have been somewhat absent because we worked hard at a new location and new connections. We have the pleasure to announce that today we are launching a new location (2nd) in the same city only main networks are different:

<br />1) Magyar Telekom (main)
<br />2) GTS Romania
<br />3) RDS-RCS

To be able to enjoy new services I decided to put on sale 500 vps top of our offer, wich contain:

<br />2 processor
<br />2 gb ram
<br />30 gb hdd
<br />30 tb / mo included traffic
<br />1gbps (shared but You Can espect up to 500 mbps Because all node have 2x1gbps dedicated, Clearly we do not allow abuse)
1ipv4 included (up to 256 IP / vps additional price for 1 eur / ipv4)
<br /><strong>Full Voxility ddos protection in maximum 1 week up to 960gbps free of charge.


All purchases will benefit from this offer 3 days money back guarantee no question asked.
